      • startingPort

        public SwarmBuilder startingPort(int startingPort)
        Override the initial port for this swarm. First swarm participant is assigned to this port, each subsequently created swarm participant is assigned to port #previous participant's port + 1.

        Default value is 6891.

        Parameters:
        startingPort - Number of seeders
        Since:
        1.0
